price: 9. Ni-Rabbow diggah Atu Agay- waaga edde Anee wayta Ayró (Qhiyaamah Ayro kinnuk) Sinam kobxise kinnito, Diggah Yalli isi Naqoosa kah xagnisem mamaka.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ ٱلنَّاسِ لِيَوۡمٖ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā innaka jāmiʿu al-nāsi liyawmin lā rayba fīhi inna al-laha lā yukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
